other_tests.procedure_name: CT Abdomen and Pelvis with Contrast
other_tests.findings: Small bilateral pleural effusions with adjacent compressive atelectasis; acute peripancreatic fluid collections; one pocket measuring 1.5 x 3.8 cm and another measuring 2.5 x 7.3 cm which has increased significantly in size from previous.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Increased size of fluid collections compared to previous imaging.

other_tests.findings: Negative for toxigenic C. difficile by the Illumigene DNA amplification assay.
